show_name: Yahari Ore no Seishun Love Comedy wa Machigatteiru.
other_title: My youth romantic comedy is wrong as I expected.
やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。
ending_theme: #1: "Hello Alone" by Yukino Yukinoshita (Saori Hayami) & Yui Yuigahama (Nao Touyama) (eps 1-4, 6-12)
#2: "Hello Alone -Yui Ballade-" by Yui Yuigahama (Nao Touyama) (ep 5)
#3: "Hello Alone -Band arrange-" by Yukino Yukinoshita (Saori Hayami) & Yui Yuigahama (Nao Touyama) (ep 13)
